thread.title: How to Dig Into the ‘Deep State’

author: J.T. Young
title: How to Dig Into the ‘Deep State’
text:
The Trump administration’s conflicts with Washington’s embedded bureaucracy aren’t mere partisan skirmishes but fundamental clashes. At play is a powerful dynamic that has spawned an increasingly powerful and unaccountable bureaucracy. Whether we call it the “deep state” or something else, this administration has run particularly afoul of the bureaucracy it was elected to manage. The bureaucracy has subverted notable parts of the president’s agenda, frequently by means of targeted leaks to the media.

This is not what the Founders...
